mapper.select: SELECT i.instore_no , i.instore_date , i.item_div , i.item_code , i.instore_quantity , i.outstore_quantity , i.stock_quantity , i.facilities_div_no , i.lot_no , i.instore_manager , i.ordering_detail_code , i.instore_div , i.instore_div_no , i.expiration_deadline , od.standard , od.unit , od.outstore_company , m.member_no , c.company_name FROM ordering_detail od JOIN instore i ON od.ordering_detail_code = i.ordering_detail_code JOIN member m ON m.member_no = i.instore_manager JOIN company c ON m.member_no = c.company_no ORDER BY i.instore_no

SELECT o.outstore_no , o.outstore_date , o.outstore_quantity , o.outstore_manager , o.orders_detail_no , o.instore_no , o.sales_no , od.standard , od.unit , od.outstore_company , od.instore_company , i.item_div FROM orders_detail od JOIN outstore o ON od.orders_detail_no = o.orders_detail_no JOIN instore i ON o.instore_no = i.instore_no ORDER BY o.outstore_no
